Well, the site's all updated now. I updated everything and put in a
script for the members page to be automatically generated and for the
characters page to be easier updated by me. The Login is pretty much
the same for now, I'm going to conver the chat room to a user-specific
one for the login tomorrow.

So everyone who didn't put up their chars yet, do so! The faster we
get all our chars up, the faster we can start electing the new council.

I'm going to sleep. Now that most of the programming is behind me,
I'll be RPGing more often. Thanx for your patience through all this, guys.
